column1: Local Foods////Came here a few weeks ago for dinner
column2: looking to break up my habit of just grabbing a banh mi somewhere for cheap on Saturday. Ironically enough
column3: when i came here I ended up ordering their banh mi anyways (I wanted to order the Falafel sandwich that was listed on the menu here
column4: but apparently it's been taken off since that menu was posted here). The banh mi was quite good
column5: though not as good as somewhere like Les Girvals. I had chips and slaw for my sides
column7: very good (I actually think I liked the slaw more than I liked my sandwich).
